title: Quick Supper - Sirloin Steak with Rocket Pasta

ingredients.item: 6 Aberdeen Angus sirloin steaks, approx 200g each (available from the Meat Service Counter)
2 medium aubergines, cut lengthways into 8-9 slices
2 x 170g tubs Waitrose Pecorino, Basil and Pine Nut Fresh Dip

instructions.step: Rub the steaks with salt and freshly ground black pepper and a sprinkling of oregano.  Cook the pasta in plenty of boiling water for 7-8 minutes until tender. Meanwhile, brush the aubergine slices with a little olive oil and cook for 3-4 minutes on each side until lightly browned and tender. Transfer to a plate and cover with foil. Fry or barbecue the steaks for 4-5 minutes on each side. Cover and keep warm.  Drain the pasta and return to the pan. Stir in the dip and rocket, then season. Turn onto plates and top with the steaks and aubergine slices. Serve immediately.
